document.full_text: left-wing nationalist ollanta humala on tuesday promised to foster a stable investment climate and defuse social conflicts if he wins a presidential run-off in june that will hinge on swaying centrist voters.
document.title: peru's humala promises investors stability, peace
lines_and_colors: left-wing nationalist ollanta humala on tuesday promised to foster a stable investment climate and defuse social conflicts if he wins a presidential run-off in june that will hinge on swaying centrist voters.
